RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 300 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALTUVE dueled, prevailed. THEPARTYISOVERHERE bobbled, dueled, no kick. HW BOLD POLITICIAN even effort. UNWAVERING erratic, late effort. FURIA CARTEL off slow, drifted out, good try. HOT FOR BLONDES not involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Furia Cartel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, drifted out, good try

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUCHECK JQM dueled, won nod. CADDO LIGHTS bumped, drift in, dueled, lost nod. ABSOLUTION BY FIRE bumped, speed, faded. GRAND MAJESTY unsettled gate, broke in, bumped. CHAVEZ LEGACY broke thru prestart. EYE ON PANAMA bumped, alter path. JIMS CAPO unsettled, bumped both sides.

ENTRY.NAME: Caddo Lights
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, drift in, dueled, lost nod

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 10700. FOR COLORADO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHROMESIDSATION had no early speed, made a rail bid on the turn but lacked room at the quarter pole and waited for a hole to open up, split horses at the eighth pole and made a late surge to be up in the final jumps. OLD FASHION TIME tracked the leaders from the inside on the backstretch then moved out to three wide at the half mile marker, made a late run in the stretch and took a brief late lead but couldn't fend off the inside closing rival. GUTFIELD vied for the lead from the two path and engaged the leader at the quarter pole and took a brief lead at the eighth pole but was over taken at the sixteenth pole and tired. JAKE ON DAKAN sprinted to a clear lead to mid turn then was headed at the quarter pole and matched strides to the top of the stretch, gave way. SILENCE'S NATION was always back and outrun. RACE WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Old Fashion Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 3w1/2, brief late lead, couldn't fend

ENTRY.NAME: Jake On Dakan
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, headed 1/4, match strides, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Chromesidsation
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, rail bid turn, lacked room, split horses, late surge

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 7200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $6250 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $8000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250. Colora do Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE'S SMART ENOUGH was away alertly, vied for lead from two wide through the turn then engaged the leader at the eighth pole and battled to the final yards and drew clear late. JULIARD HONOR rushed up to take a clear lead through the turn then was collared at the eighth pole and fought gamely to the final jumps. BORN TO REIGN raced near the back, saved ground while racing evenly. WE ALL AGREE tracked the leaders down the backstretch, raced three wide through the turn but lacked a late response. CAROLYN'S WAY had no early speed, tipped in to save ground around the turn but was outrun. PALM COURT raced in the middle of the pack from four wide on the backstretch then fell back on the turn, eased, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Juliard Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, clear lead, collared 1/8, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Carolyn's Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground turn, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Palm Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 4w, fell back turn, eased, jog in

ENTRY.NAME: She's Smart Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied 2w, late lead, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 12100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARLET COLE sprinted to a clear lead but floated out at the three furlong marker and kept on and drew off in the stretch. HIGH GUNNER bobbled after the start then rushed to contention from four wide through the turn and made a late run to be second best. DOOIT close up to the pace from the two path, showing even effort through the turn but lacked a late response. CHASING DIVINITY was off the pace while saving ground throughout and was outfinished. SPECIAL TWIST was forwardly placed from between horse in the early stages then was under wraps at the five furlong marker and was not a factor. LUNA ROSE was always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Special Twist
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, under wraps 5/8, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Dooit
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, even effort, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: High Gunner
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, rush up 4w, late run, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Starlet Cole
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, floated out 3/8, kept on, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED AT THE CURRENT 2023 BALLY'S ARAPAHOE PARK MEET AND HAVE NOT FINISHED 1ST, 2ND OR 3RD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: D'WILD MUFFIN shared the command from the two path to the five sixteenths pole then inched away and drew off in the stretch. CREDIT CARD FRAUD vied for the lead from three wide to the turn then fell back around the turn but made a late run to be up for the place. IMA FINAL DE BUY shared the command from the inside to the five sixteenths pole then kept on but was outfinished. KALLINIKI was forwardly place while trailing through the turn and passed tiring rival. OUT OF THE SKY was off the pace from four wide to the turn then moved in to three wide while moving up but tired in the stretch. PER RULING FROM HIWU, D'WILD MUFFIN WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-D'wild Muffin
ENTRY.COMMENT: shared command, inched away, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Credit Card Fraud
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w, fell back turn, late run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 300 Y Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE WAGON drifted in bread, bothered foe. GOING TO B MIRACLE in tight late, bumped late. JUST COLD CORONA drifted in, bumped foe. PS MISS DAISY strong effort. EL CAPITAN LEW bumped, checked early. BRAVE PANTHER DG bumped, foe crossed path. YOU HAVE NO RIVAL hopped start, not involved. A STEWARD INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE RUNNING OF THE RACE, AFTER A REVIEW IS WAS DECLARED THAT LITTLE WAGON INTERFERED WITH BRAVE PANTHER AND EL CAPITAN LEW AT THE START WHICH CAUSED LITTLE WAGON TO BE DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST TO SIXTH.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 350 Y Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIGHTNING JESS steady driving finish. DG VICTORYNVALHALLA hard fought loss. CORONAS FOR IVORY drifted in, gamely. LUXURY PAINT solid try. J BEST PLEASURE steady effort. MS EIRELI drifted out, close thru out. PRIMEROINDIOAZOOM stumbled badly.
